law.catch_line: The Secretary shall adopt rules and regulations that:...
law.text:
The Secretary shall adopt rules and regulations that:
Ensure that a private therapeutic group home provides mental health care and treatment in accordance with Part IV of this subtitle; and
Require a private therapeutic group home:
To provide treatment for each child and adolescent in the home;
To coordinate the treatment in the home with the appropriate public or nonpublic educational program conducted outside of the home; and
To provide 24-hour supervision for each child and adolescent for the time that the child and adolescent are not participating in a program conducted outside of the home.
